QuestData.Title: Lessons from History
QuestData.Description: The Thunder King was a vicious Emperor and with the Zandalari at his side he was unstoppable. His return would surely return this land to turmoil and misery.$b$bYou must locate his remains and take them somewhere safe. The Tablet of Thunder should help you figure out how to access his tomb.
QuestData.LogDescription: Read the Tablet of Thunder in the Tomb of Conquerors.
QuestData.RewardText: They will need to move the remains to a secure location. We must go after them!
